name: Relembre
description:
RELEMBRE is all about the lofi chill seasoned with nostalgia. You take the post of a VHS rewinder at a film rental store outside of time, where you organize old movies while reminiscing on the memories they gave you. 

RELEMBRE  is a no-rush, no-pressure game, so take your time and enjoy the little moments!

Code by: Felipe Gomes [Frango]
Art by: Diego Crispim [Solidfox]
Music: Shikutomoto [Lofi Hiphop/Chillhop]{Royalty Free} by Neighbourhood Vandal
